Title: Relates to proceeds from the auction or sale of carbon dioxide emission allowances
Summary: Prohibits proceeds from the auction or sale of carbon dioxide emission allowances pursuant to New York's participation in the regional greenhouse gas initiative (RGGI) from being transferred into the state general fund; provides that if such proceeds are transferred to the state general fund, they shall be used for the purposes directed by the RGGI.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to proceeds from the auction or sale of carbon dioxide emission allowances
